change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Honor Roll of Arizona: European War, 1914-1918
did.abstract: Consists of typescript biography of each person on honor roll. Includes military unit, a description of the heroic action, home address, and next of kin.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Honor Roll of Arizona: European War (AZ 244). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized alphabetically, one page per person.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Consists of typescript biography of each person on honor roll. Includes military unit, a description of the heroic action, home address, and next of kin.

Collection contains the following: Ernest Birch, James A. Cavanaugh, Reed M. Chambers, Robert L. Finch, George T. Fleet, John J. Gibney, Harry B. Horgan, Joseph N. Kerwin, Frank Luke, Morgan McDermott, Edward J. Mitchell, Ralph A. O'Neill, John H. Pruitt, Columbus Whipple.
